title: File Upload Fixes
description:
- Resolved 400 errors from incorrect bucket paths.
- Filenames are properly encoded.
- Improved upload failure messages.

title: Optional Print File Uploads
description:
- Users can attach STL, GCODE, or ZIP files when booking.
- Owners can download the file from the Owner Panel.

title: Roadmap Expansion
description:
- Added Review System to the roadmap.
- Added Owner Earnings Dashboard to the roadmap.
- Added Printer Tags & Filtering to the roadmap.

title: Booking Change Requests
description:
- Users can request changes to bookings.
- Owners approve or reject from the Owner Panel.

title: Custom Booking Runtime Limits
description:
- Added min and max runtime hours per printer.
- Booking form enforces these limits.

title: Printer Maintenance Mode
description:
- Owners can mark printers as under maintenance.
- Bookings are blocked when a printer is under maintenance.
- Maintenance status is shown on printer pages.

title: Owner Panel & Empty State UX
description:
- Resolved 'Not Authorized' message when owners had no printers.
- Added prompt to create a new listing.
- Added friendly message on the printers page when no listings are available.

title: Soft Delete System
description:
- Implemented soft delete for printers, preserving historical bookings and visibility.
- Viewing deleted printers no longer hangs and shows a deleted label.
- Fixed 'Unknown Printer' display and hid booking button for deleted listings.

title: Owner Panel Enhancements
description:
- Edit buttons in the Owner Panel now link to the printer edit screen.
- Added printer availability controls and booking status management for owners.

title: Dashboard Launch
description:
- Added a fully functional Owner Panel with printer and booking summaries.
- Built the My Printers page for managing listings.
- Populated the Profile page with user details, account actions, and upcoming bookings.

title: Initial Public Release
description:
- First public version of RentAPrint.
- Resolved booking issues and improved printer search.

title: Major Updates
description:
- Improved booking cancellation errors.
- Cleaned duplicate components.
- Clarified test instructions and fixed environment example.

title: STL-First Workflow
description:
- Added slicing preference fields to bookings.
- Owners upload G-code and update status.
- New status flow and owner panel section for awaiting_slice.
